definition:
A meal taken at the close of the day; the evening meal. Note: Supper is much used in an obvious sense, either adjectively or as the first part of a compound; as, supper time or supper-time, supper bell, supper hour, etc.

To take supper; to sup. [R.]

To supply with supper. [R.] "Kester was suppering the horses." Mrs. Gaskell.
